name: LaserBox
description: LaserBox is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is an esteemed member of the WebtrES club. With its unique combination of soldier-like box structure, cat-themed buttons, and cat-like arms and legs, LaserBox stands out among its robotic peers. Its main feature is the laser screen, which allows it to visualize and measure electronic signals with precision and accuracy. LaserBox is known for its exceptional abilities in combat and its charming personality, making it a valuable asset to the WebtrES club.
